org.kepler.ddp

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.ddp.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utilities for DDP classes. The methods and fields in this class are not specific to a DDP engine.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl and Jianwu Wang

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Utilities.TokenType
      Enumeration of types of token that can be serialized to/from strings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Utilities

        public Utilities()

    • Method Detail

      • checkDirectorIterations

        public static boolean checkDirectorIterations(CompositeActor model,
                                              boolean runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput)
        Check the director and its iterations with the runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput value. If the director is SDF, this method changes the iterations based on the value in runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput. If the director is DDF, then runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput is changed to true.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to execute in the stub.
        runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput - if true, the full lifecycle of the model will be executed for each input. If false, only one iteration of the model will be execute for each input.
        Returns:
        the (possibly changed) runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput value.

      • createManagerForModel

        public static Manager createManagerForModel(CompositeActor model,
                                            ExecutionListener listener,
                                            StubBaseActor stubSource,
                                            StubBaseActor stubSink,
                                            boolean runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput,
                                            boolean enablePrintTimeAndMemory)
        Create a Manager for a model and optionally start execution.
        Parameters:
        model - the workflow
        listener - an ExecutionListener to register with the Manager to receive error messages.
        stubSource - the source actor in the model
        stubSink - the sink actor in the model
        runWorkflowLifecyclePerInput - if true, execute the full lifecycle of the model for each input and the stub must tell the manager to execute the model. If false, this method starts execution.
        enablePrintTimeAndMemory - if true, print an execution summary each time the model executes.

      • getModel

        public static CompositeActor getModel(java.lang.String modelName,
                                      java.lang.String modelString,
                                      java.lang.String modelFile,
                                      boolean sameJVM,
                                      java.lang.String redirectDir)
        Load the model for a stub from a Nephele Configuration. The top-level ports and connected relations are removed.

      • removeModelPorts

        public static void removeModelPorts(CompositeActor model)
        Remove top-level ports and relations from a composite actor.

      • createTokenFromString

        public static Token createTokenFromString(java.lang.String tokenStr,
                                          Type type)
        Create a Token from a string based on the Ptolemy Type.

      • createTokenFromString

        public static Token createTokenFromString(java.lang.String tokenStr,
                                          Utilities.TokenType type)
        Create a Token from a string based on the TokenType enum.

      • getTokenTypeForSerialization

        public static Utilities.TokenType getTokenTypeForSerialization(Token token)
        Get the TokenType for a token.

      • getEngineProperty

        public static ConfigurationProperty getEngineProperty(java.lang.String engineName,
                                                      Nameable source)
                                               throws IllegalActionException
        Get the ConfigurationProperty for an Engine on the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        engineName - The name of the ddp engine
        source - The source object calling this method
        Returns:
        If found, returns the ConfigurationProperty. If not found, throws an exception.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • getExecutionLanguageNames

        public static java.lang.String[] getExecutionLanguageNames()
                                                    throws IllegalActionException
        Get a list of available execution language names.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • getJarsForLanguage

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getJarsForLanguage(java.lang.String languageName)
                                                           throws IllegalActionException
        Get the jars for a language. Returns an empty list if there are non jars.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • getScriptEngineName

        public static java.lang.String getScriptEngineName(java.lang.String languageName)
                                            throws IllegalActionException
        Get the script engine name for a language. Returns null if the language is not found in the configuration, or is not supported by a script engine.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • getScriptEngineFactoryName

        public static java.lang.String getScriptEngineFactoryName(java.lang.String languageName)
                                                   throws IllegalActionException
        Get the script engine factory name for a language. Returns null if the language is not found in the configuration, or is not supported by a script engine.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • isExecutingUnderResourceManager

        public static boolean isExecutingUnderResourceManager()
        Returns true if an environment variable is set when executing under a resource manager such as PBS or SLURM.
